articles.description: Shubho Paul, who was until a few years ago a barefoot footballer who would go to training grounds on a borrowed cycle, is now set to travel to Bayern Munich to play against U-19 teams in the Bundesliga.
articles.content: Not so long ago Subho Paul used to ride to local games on a cycle borrowed from his coach. Now, the 17-year-old from West Bengals Saikia will soon be on a flight to Germany, to play for Budesliga Cha… [+4495 chars]

articles.author: George Dobell
articles.title: ECB announces 'social media review' of historic posts - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Review will address historical issues, remind players of responsibilities and "help them learn"
articles.content: NewsReview will address historical issues, remind players of responsibilities and "help them learn"
